mapper.select: SELECT doc_file_id, doc_id, doc_file_name, doc_file_data, doc_file_type, doc_file_length FROM documents_files WHERE doc_file_id = #{docFileId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO documents_files ( doc_file_id, doc_id, doc_file_name, doc_file_data, doc_file_type, doc_file_length ) VALUES ( #{docFileId}, #{docId}, #{docFileName}, #{docFileData}, #{docFileType}, #{docFileLength} )
mapper.update: UPDATE documents_files SET doc_id = #{docId}, doc_file_name = #{docFileName}, doc_file_data = #{docFileData}, doc_file_type = #{docFileType}, doc_file_length = #{docFileLength} WHERE doc_file_id = #{docFileId}
